Appendix A — Sample .env
FLASK_ENV=production
SECRET_KEY=change_me_to_random_32_chars
DATABASE_URL=sqlite:///memory_mvp.db
UPLOAD_DIR=/var/app/uploads
MAX_UPLOAD_MB=25
ENABLE_AUTH=true

Appendix B — Supported Import Formats (MVP)
 Plain text (.txt): one message per line or paragraph; basic metadata from filename.
 JSON (.json): array of messages with fields {sender, sent_at, text, html?, meta?}.
 HTML (.html): basic DOM scrape for message blocks; sanitize to text.
 CSV (.csv): columns [thread_id?, sender, sent_at, text].

Appendix C — API Sketch (Optional)
If you later expose APIs for automation:
 POST /api/v1/import — multipart upload; returns ingest_id.
 GET /api/v1/search?q=... — JSON results with pagination.
 GET /api/v1/thread/<id> — thread JSON.
 POST /api/v1/tag — add/remove tags.

Appendix D — Phase 2+ Roadmap (Condensed)
 Integrate Meilisearch for faster fuzzy search.
 Add tagging UI and saved collections.
 Export templates (Slack MD, HTML, plain text)
 Optional Stripe for freemium model (limits + $5/mo).
 Encrypted at-rest storage and roles/permissions.
